purpose.p: The Document and version identification application module supports the requirement to identify and version documents.

inscope.li: the identification of versions for documents (which can be null);
a data structure for specifying document categories.

outscope.li: all concepts not involved in the specification of the concept of document identification.

definition.def: A document is a form of information which is controlled and communicated as one single unit. A document may be a physically bound book, collection of pages or may exist only in electronic form as one or more files on some electronic medium. More generally a document is a product of the documentation process and records information about some subject.

description.p: The Document_And_Version_Identification UoF specifies the definitional information for the concept of the identification of a document and a version.
